author: Jeff Lagerquist, CTVNews.ca
title: Following in Netherlands' footsteps, Swiss TV trolls Trump in welcome video | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV
text:
A cheeky satirical video has made a case for U.S. President Donald Trump to consider â€œSwitzerland second.â€
Citing reasons like a mutual love of Russia, a lack of Mexicans, and women who are all â€œ10s,â€ the nearly four-minute clip follows on the heels of a Dutch welcome video aimed at preferential treatment from the new U.S. administration.
â€œListen Donald. We totally understand it is going to be America first. But can we just say Switzerland second,â€ said the filmâ€™s narrator in a spot-on Trump impression.
The video from the Swiss comedy show â€œDeville Late Nightâ€ has been viewed more than 450,000 since it was posted on Thursday. Many are using the hashtag #SwitzerlandSecond to tweet the video at Trump.
â€œDear Mr. President, welcome to this introduction video about Switzerland, the sexiest country in Europe. Look at those mountains those big fat mountains. Weâ€™re not flat, like for example the Netherlands. Theyâ€™re so flat. Total disaster,â€ said the filmâ€™s narrator.
The video makes liberal use of sweeping shots of the Swiss Alps and dated footage of Swiss women frolicking in bucolic pastures, while bragging about the fact Swiss women were not allowed to vote in parts of the country until 1991.
â€œWe also love to treat our women badly,â€ said the narrator. â€œWe grab them by the civil rights. They let us do it. It was great.â€
The film goes on to boast that Switzerland is so pretty even the slums are clean, the flag is a â€œhuge plus,â€ and the Swiss invented gangster rap and Brexit (which would be better named â€œSwexitâ€ or â€œSwitzerleaveâ€).
